Compare multiple H3SDM species distribution models

Source: R/h3sdm_compare_models.R
h3sdm_compare_models.Rd

Computes and combines performance metrics for multiple species distribution models created with h3sdm_fit or similar workflows. Metrics include standard yardstick metrics (ROC AUC, accuracy, etc.), TSS (True Skill Statistic), and Boyce index. Returns a tibble summarizing model performance across all metrics.

Usage

h3sdm_compare_models(h3sdm_results)

Arguments

h3sdm_results

A workflow set or list of fitted models returned by h3sdm_fit_models or workflow_map.

presence_data

An sf object or tibble containing the presence points for computing the Boyce index.

id_col

Character. Name of the column identifying spatial units (default "h3_address").

pred_col

Character. Name of the predicted probability column (default ".pred_presence").

truth_col

Character. Name of the column with true presence/absence values (default "presence").

Value

A tibble with one row per model per metric, containing:

model

Model name

.metric

Metric name (ROC AUC, accuracy, TSS, Boyce, etc.)

.estimator

Metric type (usually "binary")

mean

Metric value

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
metrics_table <- h3sdm_compare_models(
  h3sdm_results = h3sdm_models_fitted,
  presence_data = presence_sf
)
} # }
